job.title: Early Career Data Scientist
job.description:
Arundo is a software company based in Houston, TX, and Oslo, Norway; with presence in 6 locations in Europe and the Americas. Our software enables advanced analytics, machine learning, and IoT applications for more efficient, safer, and more effective physical systems in heavy industries such as energy, chemicals, maritime, renewables and OEMs. Founded in 2015, Arundo currently consists of around 40 software engineers, data scientists, designers, and industrial domain experts.
Our team members are passionate about being part of a company that can solve tough problems and create innovative solutions. We believe in a fun environment, where our people can be fearless and feel empowered to always do the right thing. Arundites come from many different backgrounds including academia, industry, and even a submarine! We look for smart, creative thinkers with a player-coach mindset who can wear multiple hats and contribute to the company`s exciting future! And finally; we are 16 different nationalities and speak 15 different languages.
The role
We are looking for an early career Data Scientist to join our high-performing project delivery and product team in Houston who are developing data-driven software products for time series based equipment monitoring in asset industries including energy, chemicals and renewables. Our Data Science team is responsible for the development of analytical solutions for our customers, from initial feasibility studies to the deployment and maintenance of machine learning models at scale using our cloud and edge based products. We are a startup and move at a fast pace so the preferred candidate will have proven experience of producing results quickly in either a business or academic environment. You should be enthusiastic, a fast learner, have a good understanding of statistics fundamentals as well as experience applying machine learning methods to data using Python. The role will require regular presence in our office space which is in a hosted community of several exciting startup companies. There will be flexibility to work from home some days of the week.
Responsibilities include:
Who are we looking for?
Location
Houston, Texas, USA (full remote work is not an option, in-person interaction is required, there will be flexibility to work from home for some days of the week)
Travel
Required travel to customer location in the greater Houston area; all face to face meetings will be held in a responsible manner adhering to local government guidelines and customer HSE policies for Covid-19.
